com.aevi.helpers

Class ImageUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.aevi.helpers.ImageUtil

  • public final class ImageUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Utility class for providing some generic image processing and compression

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static byte[] compressImage(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
      Compress an image using the png algorithm

    • Method Detail

      • redrawImageUsingContrast

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap redrawImageUsingContrast(android.graphics.Bitmap original,
                                               int contrastLevel)
        Redraw the given image with the given contrastLevel. Contrast level 50 will return the original image. A lower level will make it lighter and a higher level will make it darker.
        Parameters:
        original - The original image
        contrastLevel - - The contrast level, lower is lighter.
        Returns:
        The processed image

      • compressImage

        public static byte[] compressImage(android.graphics.Bitmap bitmap)
        Compress an image using the png algorithm
        Parameters:
        bitmap - the image that needs to be compressed
        Returns:
        the byte array containing the compressed image

      • decompressImage

        public static android.graphics.Bitmap decompressImage(byte[] compressedBitmap)
        Decompress an byte array to regular bitmap.
        Parameters:
        compressedBitmap - the byte array of the compressed data
        Returns:
        a regular uncompressed bitmap
